name: Chubby Runner!
description:
Are you ready for the best CHUBBY GIRL game EVER?
Show me that a CHUBBY GIRL is just as good as the others!
Pass dozens of obstacles with a CHUBBY GIRL and try to reach HANDSOME MEN!
Slim down immediately to pass the other CHUBBY GIRL and reach out to HANDSOME MEN before her!
You need to FAST on the road so you can walk on the final podium with handsome mans!


This game is fun, this game is epic, this game is for baddies!
